item.title: Even Permutations and Some Simple Non-Abelian Groups
item.description: In this entry we prove that A_n is normal when n >= 5. We then use this result to prove that there is no generalization of “even” and “odd” permutation to three or more classes – i.e. there is no class of homomorphisms into Z_n, where n > 2.
